about_the_game:
Play fast card duels, open booster packs, discover cards with powerful synergies and build your best deck in this Singleplayer Roguelike Deckbuilder inspired by Trading Card Games.

Key Features:

  • Trading Card Game Experience: The joy of Trading Card Games without having to spend real-world currency on booster packs.

  • Booster packs: Open booster packs to obtain exciting new cards.

  • Deckbuilding: Builds decks with potent synergies or to counter your next opponent.

  • Card market: Buy and sell cards but make sure it's the right decision for your card collection.

  • Lustrum Items: Powerful artifacts that give you various advantages and make each playthrough unique.

Flow:

  • Play quick duels

    Go toe-to-toe with your opponent. Let your cards battle it out on the field. The player with the most victory points wins the duel.

  • Open booster packs

    Use your prize money to buy booster packs and gain powerful new cards.

  • Build your deck

    Optimize your deck with synergies and counters before facing your next opponent.

  • Face the next Champion

    Hone your duel skills and grow your card collection before the next champion challenges you to a duel.

  • Gain mysterious lustrum items

    Defeated champions reward you with lustrum items which can grant you various bonusses on and off the duel field.

name: Duel Champions II - Roguelike Deckbuilder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A singleplayer Trading Card Game experience. Play quick card duels, open booster packs, discover new cards with various effects and build the best deck to face your next opponent. Ready to duel?
